### Column {width=50%}

```{r}
#| title: title
# Step 1: Map variable codes to readable violence type names
violence_labels <- c(
  GBVPHYVA = "Physical violence",
  GBVSEXVA = "Sexual violence",
  GBVPSYVA = "Psychological violence",
  GBVECONV = "Economic violence",
  GBVONLV  = "Online violence"
)

# Step 2: Prepare data
nilt_historical_chart2$year <- as.character(nilt_historical_chart2$year)
nilt_historical_chart2$variable_label <- recode(nilt_historical_chart2$variable, !!!violence_labels)

# Step 3: Wrap the data in SharedData for Crosstalk interactivity
shared_nilt <- SharedData$new(
  nilt_historical_chart2,
  key = ~variable,
  group = "violence_type"
)

# Step 4: Get the unique years for setting tick values
unique_years <- sort(unique(nilt_historical_chart2$year))

# Step 5: Single-selection dropdown for 'variable'
filter_select(
  id = "var_filter",
  selected = "Sexual violence",
  label = "Select Violence Type",
  sharedData = shared_nilt,
  group = ~variable_label,
  multiple = FALSE
)

# Step 6: Plotly interactive line chart with custom y-axis annotation
plot_ly(shared_nilt, 
        x = ~year, 
        y = ~percentage_yes, 
        color = ~gender, 
        type = 'scatter', 
        mode = 'lines+markers',
        hoverinfo = "text",
        text = ~paste0(
                year,
                "<br>", gender,
                "<br>", variable_label, ": ", sprintf("%.2f%%", percentage_yes)
)) %>%
  layout(
    title = "Percentage Saying Yes Over Time",
    
    xaxis = list(
      title = "Year",
      showgrid = FALSE,
      showline = TRUE,
      linecolor = "black",
      linewidth = 1,
      tickvals = unique_years,
      ticktext = unique_years
    ),
    
    yaxis = list(
      title = "",  # remove y-axis title
      showgrid = FALSE,
      showline = TRUE,
      linecolor = "black",
      linewidth = 1,
      rangemode = "tozero"
    ),
    
    legend = list(title = list(text = "")),
    margin = list(t = 110),  
    annotations = list(
      list(
        x = -0.008,
        xref = "paper",
        xanchor = "center",
        y = 1.025,
        yref = "paper",
        yanchor = "bottom",
        text = "Percentage %",
        showarrow = FALSE,
        font = list(size = 14)
      )
    ),
    
    hoverlabel = list(
      font = list(color = "white")
    )
  ) %>%
  config(displayModeBar = FALSE)


```
